fullText:
Spare Infusion

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Half-elf, Dilettante racial trait, artificer, Healing Infusion class feature
Benefit: Once per day, you can expend your half-elf Dilettante power as a free action to use a Healing Infusion power one extra time during the encounter.

Published in Dragon Magazine 387, page(s) 35.
name: Spare Infusion

benefit: Once per day, you can expend your half-elf Dilettante power as a free action to use a Healing Infusion power one extra time during the encounter.
